Ross Patterson and Dan Hollaway discuss the Warriors making it to their 5th straight Championship in the NBA, the possible Stanley Cup matchup in the NHL with the Bruins, that brutal 1st round knockout by Deontay Wilder in boxing, and the current standings in MLB.

description:
Ross Patterson and Dan Hollaway discuss the Warriors making it to their 5th straight Championship in the NBA, the possible Stanley Cup matchup in the NHL with the Bruins, that brutal 1st round knockout by Deontay Wilder in boxing, and the current standings in MLB.
